titleInfo.title: Liste des Valeurs de Dame Louise Doussan entre les Mains de MFavrot, 1870 Feb7

mods.abstract: A Civil War veteran and local public official in West Baton Rouge Parish, H.M(Henri Mortimer) Favrot was the son of Augustine Eulalie Duplantier and Louis Favrot A cousin of Louise Perrin Doussan, H.MFavrot managed her interests in Louisiana beginning in the 1860sLetter contains financial statements for Louise Doussan's assets managed by H.MFarvrot.
mods.note: Baton Rouge, February 7, 1870, 'Liste des Valeurs de Dame Louise Doussan entre les Mains de MFavrot.'
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU LibrariesCopyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Division, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Doussan Family Papers, Mss4800, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
